pageContent: Background: Prostate cancer is a prominent form of cancer diagnosed in men living in developed countries, for which radical prostatectomy is a common frontline treatment. The aim of this systematic review was to determine whether robot-assisted laparoscopic radical prostatectomy (RALP) is more effective in the treatment of localised prostate cancer, compared to laparoscopic radical prostatectomy (LRP).

metaData.source:
Radical prostatectomy and simultaneous penile prosthesis implantation: a narrative review
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/31395986/
